articles.content:

articles.title: India ICICI bank: 'My bank manager stole $1.9m from my account' - BBC
articles.description: Shveta Sharma accuses the bank manager at India's ICICI Bank of pulling an elaborate con.
articles.content:
An Indian woman has accused a manager at one of the country's largest banks of defrauding her by siphoning off 160m rupees ($1.9m; £1.5m) from her account.
Shveta Sharma says she had transferred mon… [+5957 chars]

articles.description: The Post Office says the team will look into allegations that have emerged during a public inquiry.
